name: Adeptal Legacy
description:
After you switch characters: Deal 1 Dendro DMG, heal your active character for 1 HP.
Usage(s): 3
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After you switch characters:</color> Deal 1 $[K107], heal your active character for 1 HP.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 3</color>
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After you switch characters:</color> Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro DMG</color>, heal your active character for 1 HP.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 3</color>
